page.title: 01CLUBS-SOUTH CREAKE
page.content: The village community fosters 10 clubs covering a wide range of interests and leisure activities. Five are joint ventures with the neighbouring village Notth Creake. The Women's Institute (44 members), Happy Circle (over 40 senior citizen members), Youth Club, Mother's Union (24 members), and the Local History Society (33 members) which has been very active in encouraging interest in the many aspects of the area's past. The Wives Group offers a wide variety of topics at its monthly meetings. For the more energetic of all ages there is a Tennis Club with 2 grass courts, a Bowls Club which raises two teams to play in the district league. The Institute Club offers a bar, billiards and darts facilities.
